property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win a [Power] challenge, move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to your own.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win dominance, gain 2 power for your faction.

property.name: Text
property.value: A player cannot initiate a [Military] or [Power] challenge unless he or she has won an [Intrigue] challenge that phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost of the first <Lord> or <Lady> character you marshal this round by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may initiate an additional [Military] challenge during the challenges phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: <When Revealed:> Search the top 10 cards of your deck for an attachment or a location, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: <When Revealed:> Choose an opponent. Gain 1 gold for each character that player controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: <When Revealed:> Name a challenge type. Until you reveal a new plot card, reduce the claim value on the attacking player's revealed plot card by 1 during challenges of that type in which you are the defending player.

property.name: Text
property.value: <When Revealed:> Choose an attachment, and discard it from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: <When Revealed:> Choose and kneel a character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Treat each character as if its printed text box were blank (except for <Traits>).

property.name: Text
property.value: <When Revealed:> Choose an opponent. Discard 1 card at random from that player's hand. If that card is a character, gain 2 power for your faction and place the discarded character in its owner's dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player cannot declare more than 1 character as an attacker or defender in each challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: <When Revealed:> Each player chooses a character he or she controls (if able), and discards it from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot marshal locations or attachments, or play events.

property.name: Text
property.value: Treat the base gold value on each revealed <Kingdom> and each revealed <Edict> plot card as if it were 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: <When Revealed:> Place 1 stand token on Power Behind the Throne. <Action:> Discard 1 stand token from Power Behind the Throne to choose and stand a character.

property.name: Text
property.value: <When Revealed:> Choose up to 3 cards in your discard pile, and shuffle them into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: <When Revealed:> Choose a character with printed cost 5 or lower in your hand or discard pile, and put it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot initiate more than 1 challenge during the challenges phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: <When Revealed:> Search the top 10 cards of your deck for a character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Forced Reaction:> After the challenges phase begins, each player returns all gold in his or her gold pool to the treasury.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may marshal or play 1 additional limited card this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: <When Revealed:> Each player chooses up to 3 characters he or she controls. Kill each character not chosen (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot include more than 15 neutral cards in your deck. <Action:> Kneel your faction card to reduce the cost of the next loyal card you marshal or play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you marshal Littlefinger, draw 2 cards. +1 Income.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. <Interrupt:> When the dominance phase ends, remove Varys from the game to discard each character from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. <Reaction:> After you win a challenge in which Rattleshirt's Raiders is participating as an attacker, choose an attachment controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. Pillage. <Challenges Action:> Kneel your faction card to choose a participating Wildling character you control. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Lord> or <Lady> character only. <Action:> Kneel Seal of the Hand to stand attached character.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Lord> or <Lady> character only. <Interrupt:> When attached character would be killed or discarded from play, sacrifice Bodyguard to save that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Terminal. Treat attached character's printed text box as if it were blank (except for <Traits>).

property.name: Text
property.value: The Iron Throne contributes 8 STR to your total for dominance. +1 Reserve.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited. <Marshaling Action:> Kneel and sacrifice The Kingsroad to reduce the cost of the next character you marshal this phase by 3. +1 Initiative.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win a [Military] challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent. (Max 1 per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win a [Military] challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, choose a location controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it from play. (Max 1 per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win a [Power] challenge by 5 or more STR, gain 2 power for your faction. (Max 1 per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win an [Intrigue] challenge as the attacking player, place a poison token on a character without an [Intrigue] icon controlled by the losing opponent. At the end of the phase, if that character still has the poison token, remove it and kill that character. (Max 1 per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: <Interrupt:> When the effects of an opponent's event would initiate, cancel those effects. X is that event's printed cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Maester Cressen to choose a <Condition> attachment, and discard it from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you marshal or play a <R'hllor> card, choose and kneel a character. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Intimidate. Renown. Robert Baratheon gets +1 STR for each other kneeling character in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Challenges Action:> Pay 1 gold to choose a [Baratheon] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an [Intrigue] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. <Interrupt:> When Ser Davos Seaworth is killed, return him to your hand instead of placing him in your dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Interrupt:> When Shireen Baratheon is killed, choose and kneel a character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player cannot stand more than 2 characters during the standing phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After the dominance phase begins, stand Fiery Followers.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. While an opponent controls a King character, King's Hunting Party gains an [Intrigue] icon .

property.name: Text
property.value: <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Dragonstone Faithful to reduce the cost of the next [Baratheon] character you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After Vanguard Lancer enters play, choose an opponent's character or faction card, and discard 1 power from that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Baratheon] character only. If attached character is Stannis Baratheon, he gains renown. <Reaction:> After attached character gains 1 or more power, stand it. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited. <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Dragonstone Port to reduce the cost of the next [Baratheon] card you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win dominance, kneel Chamber of the Painted Table to move 1 power from an opponent's faction card to your own.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Red Keep contributes 2 STR to your side during any [Power] challenge in which you control a participating character. <Interrupt:> When the challenges phase ends, if you have not lost a [Power] challenge this round, kneel The Red Keep to draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Marshaling Action:> Choose and kneel up to 4 total STR worth of characters controlled by the same player. Then, choose one of those characters, and have it gain 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only during a challenge in which you are the defending player. <Action:> Choose a kneeling [Baratheon] character you control. That character is now participating as a defender. If you win this challenge, stand that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control a <R'hllor> character. <Challenges Action:> Choose an opponent, and look at his or her hand. Then, choose and discard 1 card from that hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win dominance, put an <Ironborn> character into play from your dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you are the first player, reduce the reserve value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. <Reaction:> After you win an unopposed challenge in which Asha Greyjoy is participating, stand her.

property.name: Text
property.value: Renown. While Balon Greyjoy is attacking, each defending character with a lower STR than his does not contribute its STR to that challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pillage. Renown. <Reaction:> After Euron Crow's Eye discards a card using pillage, put a location from the losing opponent's discard pile into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. <Reaction:> After you win an unopposed challenge in which Theon Greyjoy is participating, he gains 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. Drowned Men gets +1 STR for each <Warship> location you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Iron Islands Fishmonger to reduce the cost of the next [Greyjoy] character you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Lordsport Shipwright to choose and kneel a location with printed cost 2 or lower. (Printed cost 3 or lower instead if you are the first player.)

property.name: Text
property.value: <Ironborn> character only. <Reaction:> After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating as an attacker, sacrifice Throwing Axe to choose and kill a defending character.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control Balon Greyjoy, he gains stealth. <Reaction:> After you win an unopposed challenge, either: draw 1 card, or gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit twice per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: <Challenges Action:> Kneel Iron Fleet Scout to choose a participating [Greyjoy] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR. (+2 STR instead if you are the first player.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited. <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Sea Tower to reduce the cost of the next [Greyjoy] card you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Interrupt:> When a [Greyjoy] character would be killed, save it. Then, attach Risen from the Sea to that character as a <Condition> attachment with the text: "Terminal. Attached character gets +1 STR."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you are the first player. <Challenges Action:> Choose a defending character with STR 5 or lower. That character does not contribute is STR to this challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win an unopposed challenge, choose an attachment or location controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it from play. (Max 1 per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: While Cersei Lannister is attacking during an [Intrigue] challenge, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After a <Lord> or <Lady> character is killed, Joffrey Baratheon gains 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Ser Jaime Lannister does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [Military] challenge, and gains renown while participating in a [Military] challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Dominance Action:> Kneel The Tickler to discard the top card of an opponent's deck. Then, you may choose 1 copy of that card, and discard it from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. <Reaction:> After an [Intrigue] challenge is initiated, gain 2 gold. (Limit twice per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Renown. Tywin Lannister gets +1 STR for each gold in your gold pool. +2 Income.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ambush (2). <Forced Interrupt:> When a phase ends in which Gold Cloaks entered play using ambush, discard it from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Lannisport Merchant to reduce the cost of the next [Lannister] character you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ambush (4). <Reaction:> After The Queen's Assassin enters play using ambush, choose an opponent. If you have more cards in hand than that player, he or she must choose and kill a character he or she controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ambush (1). Attached character gets +2 STR. If attached character is Joffrey Baratheon, he gains a [Military] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may initiate an additional [Intrigue] challenge during the challenges phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win an [Intrigue] challenge, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited. <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Western Fiefdom to reduce the cost of the next [Lannister] card you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Action:> Put a [Lannister] character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play (cannot be saved).

card.name: The Things I Do For Love

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control a [Lannister] <Lord> or <Lady> character. <Challenges Action:> Kneel your faction card to choose a character with printed cost X or lower controlled by an opponent, and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control a unique [Lannister] character. <Interrupt:> When the effects of a triggered character, location, or attachment ability would initiate, cancel those effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ambush (5). <Reaction:> After Areo Hotah enters play during a challenge, choose a participating character, and remove it from the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Action:> Put a character with printed cost 5 or lower into play from your hand. Then, return Arianne Martell to your hand (cannot be saved). (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Insight. Each other [Martell] <Lord> and <Lady> character you control gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. <Action:> Pay 1 gold to give Edric Dayne a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you lose a challenge in which Maester Caleotte is participating, choose a character. That character loses a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Obara Sand may be declared as a defender during [Power] challenges in which you are the defending player, even while kneeling.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win a challenge in which The Red Viper is participating as an attacker, he gains 1 power for every 5 STR by which you won the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Desert Scavenger to reduce the cost of the next [Martell] character you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After Dornish Paramour is declared as an attacker, choose a character controlled by the defending player. That character must be declared as a defender for this challenge, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After Greenblood Trader enters play, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add up to 1 of those cards to your hand, and place the others on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. While you are not the first player, Palace Spearman gains an [Intrigue] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile. While attached character has the <House Dayne> trait, it gains intimidate.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel and sacrifice Ghaston Grey to return an attacking character to its owner's hand (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel Sunspear to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during challenges of this same type until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited. <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Blood Orange Grove to reduce the cost of the next [Martell] card you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win an [Intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, gain X power for your faction. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile. (Max 1 per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you are not the first player. <Reaction:> After you lose a challenge as the defending player, name a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, the winner of the challenge cannot initiate challenges of that type. (Max 1 per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: <Action:> Choose a character with STR 4 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a [Military], an [Intrigue], and a [Power] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each <Ranger> character you control cannot be bypassed by stealth. <Interrupt:> When Benjen Stark is killed, gain 2 power for your faction. Then, shuffle him back into your deck instead of placing him in your dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. Stealth. <Reaction:> After Ghost bypasses a character using stealth, that character cannot be declared as a defender for any challenges until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments except <Weapon>. While Jon Snow is standing, he is considered to be participating in each challenge in which you control another attacking [The Night's Watch] character.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. <Interrupt:> When a [The Night's Watch] character would be killed, kneel Master Aemon to save it.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control The Wall, Old Bear Mormont does not kneel when declared as a defender. <Interrupt:> When the challenges phase ends, if you have not lost a challenge as the defending player this phase, put a [The Night's Watch] card into play from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments except <Weapon>. <Interrupt:> When Ser Waymar Royce is killed, discard 1 card at random from each opponent's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you marshal Yoren, choose a character with printed cost 3 or lower in an opponent's discard pile, and put it into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. <Dominance Action:> Return Messenger Raven to your hand to draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments except <Weapon>. <Action:> Discard 1 card from your hand to gain 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Steward at the Wall to reduce the cost of the next [The Night's Watch] character you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments except <Weapon>. <Action:> Sacrifice Veteran Builder to choose and stand a location.

property.name: Text
property.value: [The Night's Watch] character only. Attached character gets +1 STR and gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Action:> Kneel Castle Black to choose and stand a defending [The Night's Watch] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each [The Night's Watch] character you control gets +1 STR. <Forced Reaction:> After you lose an unopposed challenge, kneel The Wall. <Interrupt:> When the challenges phase ends, kneel The Wall to gain 2 power for your faction.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After an opponent collects income, move 1 gold from that player's gold pool to your own. (Max 1 per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: <Dominance Action:> Choose a non-unique character with printed cost 6 or lower. Take control of that character. (Max 1 per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only during a challenge in which you control a participating [The Night's Watch] character. <Reaction:> After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR as the defending player, the losing opponent cannot initiate challenges against you this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. While Arya Stark has a duplicate, she gains a [Military] icon. <Reaction:> After Arya Stark enters play, place the top card of your deck on her facedown as a duplicate.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Interrupt:> When the effects of an opponent's event would initiate, sacrifice Bran Stark to cancel those effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Catelyn Stark is participating in a challenge, your opponents cannot trigger card abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Renown. <Reaction:> After a challenge is initiated against you, stand Eddard Stark.

property.name: Text
property.value: Intimidate. No attachments. <Challenges Action:> Kneel Grey Wind to choose and kill a character with STR 1 or lower. (STR 2 or lower instead if you control Robb Stark).

property.name: Text
property.value: Renown. <Reaction:> After a [Stark] character you control is sacrificed or killed, stand each character you control. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Sansa Stark enters play knelt. <Reaction:> After Sansa Stark stands, gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. While you control Bran Stark, he gains insight. <Reaction:> After Summer enters play, return a [Stark] character with printed STR 2 or lower from your discard or dead pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. Direwolf Pup gets +1 STR for each other <Direwolf> card you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. While a player has a <War> plot revealed, Vanguard of the North does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [Military] challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Winterfell Steward to reduce the cost of the next [Stark] character you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Stark] character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. <Reaction:> After you win a [Military] challenge in which attached character is participating, sacrifice Ice to choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Challenges Action:> Kneel Gates of Winterfell to reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a [Stark] card, draw it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each <Direwolf> card in your hand gains ambush (X). X is that card's printed cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited. <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Heart Tree Grove to reduce the cost of the next [Stark] card you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only during a [Military] challenge. <Action:> Choose a participating [Stark] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR. If you win the challenge, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you lose an [Intrigue] challenge as the defending player, kneel a <Direwolf> character to choose and kill an attacking character. (Max 1 per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only during a challenge. <Action:> Until the end of the challenge, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1. (Max 1 per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Insight. While Daenerys Targaryen is standing, each character participating on an opponent's side in a challenge against you gets -1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. Each <Stormborn> character you control gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Renown. You may initiate an additional [Military] challenge during the challenges phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Action:> Pay 2 gold to choose and stand a character. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. <Reaction:> After you win a challenge in which a <Stormborn> character you control is participating, choose and stand a <Stormborn> character. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Renown. If Ser Jorah Mormont has 3 or more betrayal tokens on him, sacrifice him. <Forced Reaction:> After you win a challenge in which Ser Jorah Mormont is participating, place 1 betrayal token on him.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. Each <Stormborn> character you control gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Interrupt:> When Viserys Targaryen leaves play, choose an attachment, and discard it from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Action:> Sacrifice Handmaiden to choose and stand a <Lady> character.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Targaryen Loyalist to reduce the cost of the next [Targaryen] character you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments except <Weapon>. While Unsullied is attacking, each defending character gets -1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Dothraki> character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. If attached character is Khal Drogo, he does not kneel when declared as an attacker in the first [Military] challenge you initiate each round.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win a [Power] challenge, kneel Plaza of Punishment to choose a character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win a [Power] challenge, sacrifice Dothraki Sea to put a <Dothraki> character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited. <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Illyrio's Estate to reduce the cost of the next [Targaryen] card you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Action:> Kneel a <Dragon> character or Daenerys Targaryen to choose a participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -4 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Challenges Action:> Choose a unique [Targaryen] character in your dead pile, and shuffle it back into your deck. If that character is a <Hatchling>, you may put it into play instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Action:> Choose and stand a unique [Targaryen] character you control. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, return it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments except <Weapon>. While you control Right, Left gets +1 STR, gains a [Power] icon, and does not kneel when declared as a defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win an [Intrigue] challenge as the defending player, discard 1 card at random from the attacking player's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Challenges Action:> Kneel Margaery Tyrell to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost of the first event you play each round by 1. +1 Income.

property.name: Text
property.value: Renown. <Reaction:> After Randyll Tarly's STR is increased by a card effect, stand him. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments except <Weapon>. While you control Left, Right gets +1 STR, gains an [Intrigue] icon, and does not kneel when declared as a defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: Renown. While The Knight of Flowers is attacking alone, the defending player cannot declare more than 1 character as a defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win an [Intrigue] challenge in which The Queen of Thorns is participating, put a [Tyrell] character with printed cost 6 or lower into play from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Garden Caretaker to reduce the cost of the next [Tyrell] character you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ambush (4). <Reaction:> After Olenna's Informant enters play during the challenges phase, name a challenge type. You may initiate an additional challenge of that type this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. Wardens of the Reach gets +1 STR for each <The Reach> location you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tyrell] character only. <Action:> While attached character is participating in a challenge, kneel Heartsbane to give that character +3 STR until the end of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Challenges Action:> Kneel Highgarden and pay 1 gold to choose an attacking character. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel The Mander to draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited. <Marshaling Action:> Kneel Rose Garden to reduce the cost of the next [Tyrell] card you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Challenges Action:> Choose up to three [Tyrell] characters. Until the end of the phase, each of the chosen characters gets +2 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Reaction:> After you win an [Intrigue] or [Power] challenge, the losing opponent names a cardtype (character, location, attachment, or event). Search your deck for a card with a different cardtype, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: <Action:> Choose a player. Look at the top 5 cards of that player's deck. Place up to 3 of those cards on the bottom of that deck, and the others on top, in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may include non-loyal [Baratheon] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [Baratheon] cards in your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may include non-loyal [Greyjoy] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [Greyjoy] cards in your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may include non-loyal [Lannister] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [Lannister] cards in your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may include non-loyal [Martell] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [Martell] cards in your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may include non-loyal [The Night's Watch] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [The Night's Watch] cards in your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may include non-loyal [Stark] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [Stark] cards in your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may include non-loyal [Targaryen] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [Targaryen] cards in your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may include non-loyal [Tyrell] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [Tyrell] cards in your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Supported by Master of Ships Supports: Hand of the King Rivals: Master of Laws, Master of Coin You may resolve your [Intrigue] claim against any number of opponents of your choice. +1 STR [Intrigue]

property.name: Text
property.value: Supported by Master of Coin Supports: Master of Whispers Rivals: Master of Laws, Hand of the King Raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during [Military] challenges in which you are attacking a rival. +1 STR [Military]

property.name: Text
property.value: Supported by Master of Whispers. Supports: Master of Laws. Rivals: Master of Coin, Master of Ships. You may initiate an additional [Power] challenge during the challenges phase, against a different opponent. +1 STR [Power]

property.name: Text
property.value: Supported by Master of Laws. Supports: Master of Ships Rivals: Hand of the King, Master of Whispers +2 Income.

property.name: Text
property.value: Supported by Hand of the King Supports: Master of Coin Rivals: Master of Whispers, Master of Ships Increase the number of cards you draw in the draw phase by 1. +1 Reserve.

property.name: Text
property.value: Supported by None Supports: None Rivals: None You may redirect 1 challenge this round. +2 STR for Dominance
